scripts.prestart: concurrently "npm run build:packages" "npm run start:infrastructure" "npm run start:cluster"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd UI/Comparison && npm start" "cd UI && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd UI/Comparison && npm run build" "cd UI && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd UI/Comparison && npm test" "cd UI && npm test" "cd server && npm test"
